data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Dryinus Latreille (Hymenoptera, Dryinidae) from the USA

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Speranza, Stefano, Olmi, Massimo, Guglielmino, Adalgisa, Contarini, Mario (2019): A new species of the genus Dryinus Latreille (Hymenoptera, Dryinidae) from the USA. ZooKeys 871: 41-47, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.871.35974, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.871.35974
